component.name: MPRIS Timer
component.summary: A timer app with seamless GNOME integration accomplished by pretending to be a media player.

description.p: A timer app (CLI/GUI) with seamless GNOME integration accomplished by pretending to be a media player. Ultimately, serves the only purpose â€” to start a timer quickly and effeciently. Notifications included! Utilizing GTK4, Adwaita and MPRIS interface.

MPRIS Timer is really keyboard friendly! It should be quite intuitive. Use navigation (arrows, tab, shift+tab) or start inputting numbers right away. Use either as a GUI app or as a CLI tool: see `mpris-timer -help`.
